answers.answer: I had preeclampsia and pitocin with first baby & the blood pressure meds counter acted the pitocin & nothing happened from 12  at night to 5 the next afternoon. Ended up with c section because babies hb dropped when she moved (cord was around neck)

question: I'm scheduled to be inducted this Sunday due to high blood pressure and preeclamsia with cytotec and pitocin. What has your experience been?
title: Induction with cytotec, your experience?
